tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_performance (
	hash_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	block_number INT,
	transaction_count INT,
	miner_address VARCHAR,
	block_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blocks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
    block_size INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transactions INT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_data (
    block_id INT,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_count INT,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_data (
    transaction_id INT,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    block_id INT,
    processing_time_ms INT,
    transaction_throughput INT,
    cpu_utilization DECIMAL(5, 2),
    memory_utilization DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE analytics_insights (
    analysis_id INT,
    block_id INT,
    avg_transaction_amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    total_transactions_count INT,
    max_transaction_amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
